title: Kenneth Cole New York Men's KC8048 Automatic Analog Display Japanese Automatic Black Watch
feature: Kenneth Cole is known for being resourceful, creative, and pushing the edges of propriety
Water resistant watch perfect for water enthusiasts of any kind
Clear dial allows the inner workings of the watch, or the skeleton, to take center stage
Soft and supple leather band perfect for anyone with sensitive wrists
Automatic mechanical movement means less winding and fewer battery changes
description: Kenneth Cole is known for being resourceful, creative, and pushing the edges of proprietyWater resistant watch perfect for water enthusiasts of any kindClear dial allows the inner workings of the watch, or the skeleton, to take center stageSoft and supple leather band perfect for anyone with sensitive wristsAutomatic mechanical movement means less winding and fewer battery changes This Kenneth Cole New York Fashion Watch was designed in New York by a team of designers who are based in the heart of Manhattan, the Fashion District! This custom watch features: Japanese Quartz Analog Automatic Movement with Skeleton Dial, Sweeping Second Hand, Solid Stainless Steel Case, Solid Stainless Steel Case Back and Solid Stainless Steel Crown,High Grade Genuine Leather Strap with a Solid Stainless Steel Buckle, Durable Mineral Crystal protects watch from scratches, Water-Resistant to 165 Feet (50M), and all with a Limited Lifetime Warranty!
